website_summaries.verdict: A simple and natural solution that works well for most, but may not be practical for everyone. Choose it if you need low-maintenance odor control and have a designated area where little hands – or paws – can't reach.
pros: Uses all-natural, nontoxic ingredients to remove odors
Gel solution is highly effective and easy to use: pour into any container and place in problem areas
Nonhazardous composition meets EPA’s safer product standards
cons: Although nontoxic and safe, open containers placed in general areas can get spilled
Be cautious using around children or cats

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates smoke odors
customer_reviews.text: Smells masculine not flowery. Use it in the office, car, garage, THE GUEST BEDROOM.. (anywhere someone has smoked. Grrrrrrrr). It removes cigarette and mmj smoke odors very well. I have used similar gel products from Ona but they left a chemical note in the air. This smells like essential oils and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Fan of None

customer_reviews.title: this stuff doesn't seem to work like other air fresheners by masking odors
customer_reviews.text: This is my second refillable jar of FreshWave crystal gel. My first 64 oz. jar lasted approximately 1-1/2 years with household use in 3 rooms and 1 car. Although I complain about the price (this stuff is much pricier than other products in this class), I keep going back to FreshWave because it really works and the scent is not overwhelming. As others have mentioned, this stuff doesn't seem to work like other air fresheners by masking odors. It just takes unpleasant smells out of the equation by some black voodoo magic. The only thing left behind is a faint scent of pine/floral. I'd be guzzling this stuff by the gallon if it were cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Skeletor

customer_reviews.title: It works great, just doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works very well. Has a pleasant not to overbearing scent and keeps my snake room smelling good enough where my wife doesn't complain. I pour this in separate bowls and place around the room. My only gripe with this product is that it doesn't last long. The gel dries up very quickly. I also use Ona Pro and that lasts longer but doesn't do a better job with the odor.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Barely eliminated any odor for me :-(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this because of the great reviews and I am in desperate need of a product that works. Unfortunately, I did not smell any change in the odor in my apartment. It masked it for a bit rather than eliminating. The minute I experimented and removed the gel from the room, I could smell the odor again. The gel also smells like chemicals and gave me a bit of a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works,
customer_reviews.text: I originally tried this product In a house that had been shut for a couple of years, and was going to be remodeled. It smelled pretty funky in there but using this cleared the odor within a day or so. Once the gel evaporated I saw that I could get a larger size to refill the 3 smaller containers. I’m using them in closets now, but they can go anywhere. I’m hoping the large jar won’t evaporate too quickly. The smell is fresh, but not fake smelling. I’d like to know if the lavender scent is natural before trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: I received this item two days later than expected with Prime shipping. When it arrived, the lid and seal were broken, resulting in a slimey mess. It looks as though much of the product evaporated and/or ended up smashed in the plastic bag. I tried to salvage what I could since I was looking forward to trying this in a room with lingering cigarette smoke order from a previous tenant. For the price, it would have been nice to get what was paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: We had a critter die inside the walls of a bathroom in our house so we couldn’t access it to remove it. With the summer heat, the stench gets really bad! I tried a few odor-removing products and this one has been the most effective. Even though the bathroom is small, I needed 3 small containers to deal with the smell. I ended up buying the large refill size so I could add more to the small containers as the gel dried up. It can take a few months for the critters to stop smelling so the large refill container is the most economical way to have enough supply to get this tough job done.
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am a regular user of Fresh Wave products so this is a refill order. I keep small dishes of Fresh Wave gel out in all my rooms. For sudden odors, I use the spray and I have packets that I use in trash cans, etc. I am sensitive to most scented room fresheners so I appreciate that Fresh Wave has little to no odor of its own. I highly recommend Fresh Wave products.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Wildermuth

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Good product to help reduce odor. The smell is fresh and not overbearing. I use a small Pyrex dish to hold the gel crystals and it last a couple of weeks before reducing due to evaporation. Remaining crystals are then REALLY hard at the bottom of the dish and extremely difficult to clean out, hence only 4 vs 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Always Hoping

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: Came home to my parents house after a year of school across state. Due to the 2 cats that live with them, the odor of the house was inhabitable for me. It literally smelled like a barn mixed with cat and poop and I almost vomited. I bought these for them, told them to put the gel stuff in little cups and leave them around the house. After approximately 2 weeks I came back to visit and the house was odorless. It was like magic, no lie. I have a sensitive sense of smell and my folks house smelt super duper fresh without a hint of any animals. Yes the cats were still there and they're chillin
customer_reviews.author: Minh-Kha V.

customer_reviews.title: Just an expensive air freshener
customer_reviews.text: just an expensive air freshener, it will add its smell to the closet but will not remove any odor. if you want to pay this much, pay a little more and buy a small air purifier with carbon pad. It removes the smell without adding any funky fruity odor!
customer_reviews.author: Granik

customer_reviews.title: Love to cover cat litter smells
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this stuff for years. I recently got another cat and started going through it faster... decided to buy in bulk. I can’t believe I didn’t buy it before, such a great deal and lasts a long time! I refill 4 containers every 2 months or so... occasionally need to shake it a bit to bring the freshness back. My husband hates it the first day I put it out cause it is very strong but usually fades by the next day
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS
customer_reviews.text: I BECAME FAMILIAR WITH THIS PRODUCT WHEN I QUIT SMOKING AND AFTER TRYING TO GET THE SMELL OF SMOKE OUT OF THE HOUSE, CAR ETC ETC MY KIDS BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT AND HAVE BEEN USING EVER SINCE...THE SMELL OF SMOKE IS DEFINETELY GONE AND THE NEW NATURAL "SMELL" IS WONDERFUL...BEEN USING FOR 9 YEARS..PEOPLE COME OVER AND ASK "WHAT ARE YOU USING THAT SMELLS SO CLEAN AND FRESH IN YOUR HOME".....GOOD DEAL ON THE LARGE CONTAINER ALSO...GREAT PRODUCT...
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Warning for Indoor Growers
customer_reviews.text: This will not completely resolve odor issues when growing smelly plants. For this purpose, the product is only useful 30 minutes before guests arrive and may only last about 2 hours. For spaces that do not constantly produce oders, but as an oder issue, this the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tre Revilo

customer_reviews.title: did not work, waste of money, changing brand to previous.
customer_reviews.text: disappointed. we contacted vendor for help, did not hear back. waste of money. did NOT help mildew smell in basement... other products did better job.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The scent is overwhelming at first but I can handle it since it gets rid of the odor. We use reusable diapers for our daughter which sit in the laundry room in a pale of water for 2 days till they're washed. For the first few months of this it created a smell when the tub was opened. This gel takes care of the smell. My boyfriend thought I moved the pale because he couldn't smell anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates odors totally!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product eliminates odors, my grandson stayed with us for months.He was a football coach so he came home and what gear and clothes he had in that room soon made it smell like a locker. I cleaned but it always had that under lying odor, I received this product and that room has smelled totally fresh ever since. I will never go without it and totally recommend this product, smells so fresh, not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Expert

customer_reviews.title: Helps Your House Smell Better
customer_reviews.text: If you live in an old house, especially if it's at a damp time of year, it can develop a bit of a musty smell. This product is good to help take that smell away. It's too expensive and doesn't last long before it dries up, but I think it works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: A little of this gel (say a pill bottle full, no cap), set it up on a shelf and odors are removed. Lasts a long time. Does not evaporate fast like grocery store "solid" fresheners. No heavy perfume, just a fresh, clean smell. Good in bathrooms, kitchens, pet areas. Easy to refill, spoons out like jello. I'm going to keep using it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gail, Hemet, CA

customer_reviews.title: Highly overpriced..
customer_reviews.text: This does smell good, however, its excruciatingly expensive and lasts for about a 2 weeks before it dries out.. I suggest other alternatives to keep your setting smelling nice. Wish I can get a refund... didn't last long at all...
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Cases

customer_reviews.title: Wished for more odor elimination
customer_reviews.text: It's okay was hoping for more odor elimination but it helps a little
customer_reviews.author: Princess D.

customer_reviews.title: Product GREAT - Shipping not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years (purchasing it at hardware stores) because it works very well. BUT - the product arrived this time purchases from Amazon with one of the containers broken open and the liquid spilling out and soaking the cardboard shipping box! Was able to salvage most of the product by transferring it to an old - almost empty- container. Did not want to go thru the process of returning it - but much of the liquid was lair soaking into the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!!! I usually like strong smelling deodorizers. It does have a small fresh scent to it, but you have to really put your nose in it to smell. So I thought it would not work. I was wrong. I have smoked in my house and garage occasionally and now my husband and I are selling the house. I just put some of this stuff in some small bowls and placed two in each room. My house smells SUPER CLEAN! No deodorizer smell just CLEAN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: The scent when you first pour some into the smaller containers is very strong and overwhelming but I get used to it quickly and it doesn't bother me after about minute or two. It absorbs order well. I have a small container in my dinning room where the dogs stay in their kennels all day and my dining room does not smell at all. This product is not a miracle worker though, if your dogs come inside wet from the rain your house will smell like a wet dog. The best you can do is dry your dogs off and use the Fresh Wave spray on their beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Refilling my odor eliminating jars is now easier than ever and yes, any unwanted odors are gone. I have one in my closet, one in the kitchen, one in living room and laundry room just to eliminate any potential odors. We have two dogs and two cats all inside and their "scent" is no match when up against the Fresh Wave beads or candles. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fox

customer_reviews.title: Most effective odor preventer and remover!
customer_reviews.text: With a dog in the house, I do not want the stinky wet dog or dirty dog smell. Keep in mind, I do groom dog! This product just gives me that extra bonus that the house won't smell! I first purchased the small containers and now just buy the refill to fill them up! It's definitely worth the extra $. When I say this, I mean it's not cheap, but it sure works!
customer_reviews.author: K9Handler

customer_reviews.title: Really works well!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for many years. Really works because it does not mask odors but eliminates them by absorbing them into the product and is dissipates. No phony scents or flowery smells that try to cover up the smell. Works well for people allergic to scents as this one really does not have a scent unless you hold it right up to your nose. May seem expensive at first but since it lasts long and works well it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. I use it in a closet that can get stuffy. I don't like perfumy scents, or scents that cling to clothes. This does neither. It smells more or less like pine needs and lime. It doesn't hang in the air, but the musty odor in the closet went away. I have been using this product for years, and won't use anything else at this point. I also use it in the car at the end of winter, and keep it in my office in case there is a lot of garlic in my lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Gustav

customer_reviews.title: Removes odors
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It removes odors, doesn't just cover it up. It has a fresh, minty smell that is barely detectable, as opposed to the stinky air fresheners that don't work at all. I've been buying this for probably 10 years, and now it's available in a lavender scent that I want to try.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Moughler

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Fresh Wave Oder Removing Gel Refill in April 2019. It was a 63 oz big bottle. The seller was Vacuum4U. I used once, about a few oz. The lid then was tightly closed. However, when I opened the bottle in July, the gel in the bottle was completely evaporated, nothing left. My wife purchased the same product from Amazon several times before, sold by a different seller. Each lasted more than a year. Why did this one last less than 3 months?
customer_reviews.author: Xiaolin Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: It smells good but doesn't seem to deodorize well. I can tell the first few hours it is out and then I feel like it stops working. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: workingmom

customer_reviews.title: Odor isn't that bad in my house most of the year but by ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why it works so well but it does. For me specifically - I place one jar by the noxious open cat litter box and one upstairs in the hallways to eliminate that "musty" smell. Odor isn't that bad in my house most of the year but by the time the weather warms up in summer, that's when the litter box gets foul something awful. Fresh wave does a nice job managing it. The crystals last a while - I get about 2 months out of each jar. Then I use the refill 64-ounce jar to replenish the smaller ones. Good value for the work it does.
customer_reviews.author: John Catapano

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell of this stuff, and it works pretty well too.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like most odor removers because they can emit a fake or unpleasant odor in their attempt to mask other odors. But Fresh Wave has a natural pleasant smell, not obnoxious or too strong. And it works pretty well too. I keep it near the cat kitty litter and it doesn't mask ALL the smells, but it certainly reduces them.
customer_reviews.author: Hava Edelstein

customer_reviews.title: good while it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product except that it melts away quickly and I have to shake the containers to give the gel a boost to begin working again. And, the refill bottle lid does not line up with the pour spout so I can't use the spout for filling the room freshener containers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: this has worked well for us
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the (large) refill because our experience with the first 'cannister' worked so well. we do not have the best ventilation system in our kitchen...and this product has worked wonders when we've prepared pungent dishes. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: the pearl

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great to quickly eliminate cooking odors and can be moved from room to room easily, or hidden out of site, in a dish if desired. It has a very fresh, non-perfume scent, which I appreciate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Worley

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other freshener
customer_reviews.text: One thing that I hate about a lot of other odor solutions for houses is they usually try to mask the smell that is already there. Unlike other fresheners, this gel ABSORBS the smells that are already there and leave a very subtle odor behind. There were a great investment in college when they could even cover up the smell of three boys living together and all their gym cloths. I remember people commenting that this was the best boys rooms they have smelled. Since then I have used this gel religiously and always have a nice smelling house. 10/10 I do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Goldblum

customer_reviews.title: Nothing noticeable unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to believe in this product so I could turn a 2 kid/3 cat house into a less stinky one. I put this out doing various amounts and holders and honestly noticed 0 difference. I know I was searching for a miracle but sad to say not yet. I’ll pass.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I dog dog boarding in my house and it can get smelly! My friend recommended freshwave because he used it in his house after the Malibu fire. His house didn't burn but had lots of damage with smoke and smell. In both cases it worked very well! Thank you! I will be a long time user.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the lid broken and about 1/5 of it was scattered on the box. That was disappointing, but the product itself is great. It eliminates disgusting odors and replaces it with a nice scent. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Good value for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a number of years and find it to be a very effective odor eliminator. We had some minor body work done on one of our cars and when we got the car back it had a very strong odor of paint fumes and other body shop smells. I put a jar of Fresh Wave in the car and within a few days the odor was gone with no residual smell from the Fresh Wave. This is an excellent product and the refill is an economical way to deploy the crystal gel in the smaller jars by refilling them when needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: How this gel works I don't know but have used it for years and love it. I order the large size and out it in smaller containers. More economical. Takes the fried food, fish, garlic, onion and other smells out of the air. Just open the jar, set it out overnight and the next morning all the bad smells are gone. Has a fresh smell but not purfumey like sprays. Does not cover the smell but eliminates it. Unless you pick it up and hold it to your nose you really can't smell it. The gel pellets gradually fade away but lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use anything else ever again.
customer_reviews.text: Although this is expensive it is so worth the money. I have never found a product that eliminates order as good as this. I buy this size to refill my smaller container of this same brand that has the mesh screen top already. It eliminates cat litter box order wonderfully. I also put in pantry where trash can sits and closet where vacuum stays. It doesn't omit another scent to cover up the odor, it just removes the order, which I love! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: We could smell the product immediately after placing in the bathroom and the hallway. Unfortunately it has the unpleasant strong chemical bathroom cleaning soap smell. We cannot use the product. Suffocating.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Cups

customer_reviews.title: Does not last!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say how much I LOVE the smell of Fresh Wave regular scent, however; it definitely does not last very long. I have bought most of the different products they have hoping to find the one that lasts long enough to get my money’s worth but all of them are short lived. I really wish they would improve the lasting effect, therefore; I would suggest finding an alternative for those of you looking into buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Still a huge fan!
customer_reviews.text: It might seem a little pricey, but this stuff works! Got turned on to it by a sister-in-law and I've been sold since. Have it in my SUV and my house. Love it! No flowery sent, just clean smell. I am a very happy repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Marshall

customer_reviews.title: works great at eliminating odor. Love the refillable pack, save some $$
customer_reviews.text: works great at eliminating odor. Love the refillable pack, save some $$. pretty much scentless but I do notice the natural odor when it's not there. great product. a little pricey even through the refills. I wish it was about half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Punn Wiantrakoon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Fresh Wave for almost a year. I like this product because it’s natural and it works efficiently. It keeps my whole apartment fresh.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Seems good!
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s actually working! I’ve tried everything in my old house apartment, my nose is sensitive. The initial odor isn’t great, but goes away in a day. Seems to be lasting awhile before drying up.
customer_reviews.author: MGSpin

customer_reviews.title: Best odor control product on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best on the market for musty odors, letterbox odors and any other household odors. It appears pricey but last well over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Gwen

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 3 years and never disappoints me. This thing eliminates odor effectively, even the most strong and pungent ones. Totally recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: wizard

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! You will be GLAD you did!
customer_reviews.text: I have never found an air freshener that was even close to being as effective. It smells wonderful and does a fantastic job. And we have four dogs and a hedgehog, by the way!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for my cats litter area
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cats litter area and it really helps with the odor.
customer_reviews.author: wenjem

customer_reviews.title: Helps to Remove Odors
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but now am a believer in the effectiveness of Fresh Wave. The odor is immediately masked by the fresh aroma of the product. Then as the product evaporates, the odor odor disappears. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff for clearing our house of wet dog/old house smells. It’s a big expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: M. H. K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on pet/old people smell
customer_reviews.text: This item WORKS. I had a really bad pet & old people smell situation, and leaving this gel in the room really did the trick. It does have a pretty strong, fresh, citrusy scent of its own, but once you close the lid, it’s gone. I highly recommend this anyone who wants to get rid of smells that are lingering in a room or the furnitures.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really needed something neutral that would eliminate those smells. I originally bought a two pack, they worked so well, I kept the containers and bought this to refill them. I would highly recommend this product for any smell.
customer_reviews.author: Natures Retreat

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well. It has a very mild scent, but we use it in our litter room and bathrooms. It does cut down on the odors in the room. I love the option to buy a large refill for my smaller containers
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Dog Owners Dream
customer_reviews.text: I love to keep a clean & fresh smelling home. With 3 dogs, that’s sometimes hard to do! Way better than plugins & sprays. It really does just get rid of smells all together instead of masking them.
customer_reviews.author: VV0620

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We have three live in dogs and have used this product for years. There is no dog oder in oue house as stated by the meeting we have held with ten plus attendies
customer_reviews.author: Gerald F. Colby

customer_reviews.title: Removed very bad smoke odor from house.
customer_reviews.text: I left the house after closing the damper and leaving the fireplace door open so the whole house had a smoke odor to it. I ordered Fresh Wave Continuous Release Odor Removing Gel from Amazon, left a bowl of it in the corner and when I returned there was not a hint of smoke or any other odor. In my opinion this is the best thing ever to safely and easily remove any odor from your home.
customer_reviews.author: SMELLYWASHER

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It keeps everything smelling fresh without the use of chemicals. It dissolves with its exposure to air and activity. I leave this in small ceramic jars in every room in my house and it smells great all the time. I found that you can add a few drop of water if it's starting to dehydrate, and it drinks it up and comes back to life. If you top it up a jar once a week or so, it will keep your house smelling fantastic naturally. It also really does work to eliminate odors. I keep a jar near our rubbish and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: rollerskate76

customer_reviews.title: No better than any other odor ban products.
customer_reviews.text: I got it based on the raving reviews for a dead mouse smell seeping through a basement wall. I put some of this jell into a medium sized plastic container inside the closet where the smell was coming from and for two days, there wasn't any noticeable difference. I went to home depot and got a few similar products with much nicer fragrance and used that instead. That also didn't completely eliminate the odor but at least covered it up with a really nice pungeant fragrance. The smell was gone after a few days. I also used this in small containers throughout the house and I just don't like the fragrance of it, reminds me of pine sol solution.
customer_reviews.author: Farooq Pervez

customer_reviews.title: Works great at reducing bad odors
customer_reviews.text: I have this product in my basement, to reduce the odors caused by our home gym down there. It works great! And I barely notice the scent of the Fresh Wave. It just smells better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Diloreto

customer_reviews.title: No improvement after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help pull out pet odor from carpet that I couldn't get out (tried vinegar + baking soda as well). Odor is still very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Daneygurl

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed at the effectiveness of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the effectiveness of this stuff. I first bought it thinking I was probably wasting my money. I don't like masking odors with perfumes and thus don't use air fresheners or other supposed odor control products. This has a smell, but it is only strong when first opened or poured, and it's not perfume-y. It's more herb-y. After the first few moments that scent lessens anyway. And, unbelievably, so do the offending odors! I use it near the litter boxes, and when it runs out you can really tell it had been working. Now it's a must have!
customer_reviews.author: seattlereader

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband is allergic to candles, perfumes,sprays...I’ve tried them all. This is the only one that does not cause him problems. I love just the pure clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: sanda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my daughter's bedroom and in our fridge. I noticed a difference within a few hours!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle stays in the utility room near the kitty litter box. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and 1 cat and by putting this next to the cat litter box and all around my house . The smell is gone !! It really works will be buying more when its time for a refill.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: fresh smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell goes away rather quickly. I put it around the house in areas my old dog is likely to pee. He is more likely to go outside now.
customer_reviews.author: My Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Initially I began with the smaller containers. Now using this large container to refill my jars. When I open the container I smell a great scent. It evaporates, but keeps my closet smelling great. Also use in my son’s room. Yay, smells tons better in there!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: No Effect on Smoke Odor
customer_reviews.text: No better than the air filter crystals you can purchase at local stores. I purchased it because I was intrigued about the review that indicated it helped clear the air from neighbors smoking-and that was in an apartment house. I needed something that would do that from neighbors who smoke in the next house. Alas, this seemed to have NO EFFECT whatsoever on that. I'm giving it a few stars, because it does seem to get rid of some odors, and is relatively long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that removes shoe odor from my closet. I bought the small jars at Costco and bought this refill canister to refill the jars. This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Fresh not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent. It is fresh but not too strong. I'm not sure I would say that it completely eliminates odors but it is much better than many other options that I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: the 9 dishes are all pretty well evaporated but the house smells fresh
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff really works. I received the full tub and promptly poured it into about 9 dishes that I placed around my house. In about two weeks time, the 9 dishes are all pretty well evaporated but the house smells fresh. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: shoggoth

customer_reviews.title: Believe it is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a less expensive alternative to the Safe T Air. Think I am going to like it. We place it near the intake of a fan to distribute it across the basement.
customer_reviews.author: GIZMO

customer_reviews.title: Air freshner that does not smell like perfume!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. I like it better than standard freshners because the scent is mild and dissipates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the past 3 years. It is all I use in bathrooms and some other parts of the house. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Stinky house
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great we live in a older home that has that old smell I put this in small bowls and set it around the house and it absorbs the smell!
customer_reviews.author: william bachman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but the cannister was open and unsealed in the shipping box when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: MissyB

customer_reviews.title: Smalls good.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only oder eliminater that my wife can stand. A little expensive but works well so can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: C,J Hayenga

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one jar of this product after getting tired of my mother's complaining about the odor in the kitty's bathroom. I just opened the pop-up lid and placed the whole jar in the bathroom, and shortly afterwards, no more complaints. The first jar lasted approx. 5 months. Once the first jar was completely consumed, my mother started to complain again, and told me to order another tub of it. Same deal, just pop the lid and leave it. I'm on my second jar, about 5 months in, and guessing from the evaporation rate, it'll last another month. Will definitely keep this on my re-order list.
customer_reviews.author: azog

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Use this in a 650 sq ft apartment. I have one 8 oz container in the bathroom and one in the kitchen. I cook with onions and make curry weekly. The odor is absorbed within 6-8 hours. Less aromatic odors are absorbed more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Nilsson

customer_reviews.title: I use it to deal with cat box.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Not overpowering does the job. I just wish it was not so costly. If it was not I could use it even more.
customer_reviews.author: naomi zyck

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because there was a dead animal smell emanating from the wall in my utility room. (I am assuming it was a mouse.) Almost immediately after setting out two small bowls of Fresh Wave, the smell was gone! The scent of this product is a little bit like Pine-Sol, which isn't my favorite smell, but the strength died down after a day or two, or I just got used to it. But I much prefer the smell of this product to decaying mouse! I also put a bowl in the downstairs bathroom and it helps in there too. (I have three little boys who often "miss.") I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wisefish

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've found to absorb orders.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've found to absorb orders, especially if you don't want perfumes. These don't last terribly long but they absorb pet odors like nothing else I've tried. My only caution is to keep them out of pet and small children (I don't know if they're toxic but I don't want to find out) and if you're putting them in a paper bowl, put a cloth underneath, the moisture will soak through.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnita

customer_reviews.title: I like this product and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and like that it has very little fragrance and is easy to place out of site. Especially good in closets, kitchens and bathrooms. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mjkl

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a deodorant. It should not be compared to Kanberra products which also inhibit mold.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Epps

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of odors, doesn't just mask them.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this gel for years. I love how it gets rid of odors, doesn't just mask them. I live in an old home which is just kind of stinky and has a stinky basement. I put a big jar in the basement and another in the livingroom and it really takes care of that old house/old basement musty smell. I also use smaller ones in each closet. It really helps with any odors. It is not a quick fix like a spray, but you will notice the difference within a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the room where my cats litter boxes are. Seems to be the best product I’ve found and I’ve tried numerous different products.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: You'll not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Been using for years. Scent does not linger.spray works great on home or car or closets. Gel can be put in smaller containers to save use and place anywhere. I haven't tried product in fresh wave we did like, pearls for vacuum work great, going to try carpet powder next. Get it you'll not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: vm

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor may be worse than what I am trying to remove-reserving judgement
customer_reviews.text: Trying to cover up a combination of cats and old house. Product scent extremely strong and not at all pleasing, seems to dissipate as you get used to it, but leaving the house and returning, I don't like the scent. I had in open bowls, have just covered them with plastic wrap an punched a small hole in that to see if I just have too much of this in the open making the scent too strong. Will revisit after another week.
customer_reviews.author: CGD

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat and a dog . No odors in my house . I have two jars, one in the cat’s room and one for the dog. Pleasant smell not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell. Fresh not too strong
customer_reviews.text: I order all the time to refill smaller containers. I even buy the spray now. Great for smelly kitchens and pets too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a preowned car. Whatever the dealership used, worked well enough to fool me. A few weeks later, the telltale signs from the previous owner's habit began to emerge. Ordered the Super Gel. Good stuff. I half-fill a canning jar that fits in one of the beverage holders. When I leave the car, I take off the top and let the car cook in the sun. It seems to be working, though it took a couple of weeks to get to the point where the car doesn't just smell perfume-ish. Worth the money and effort.
customer_reviews.author: æ

customer_reviews.title: BEST AIR FRESHENER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. Not only is it made natural, it's safe for my pets! I refill my smaller pods about every 2-3 weeks and one tub can fill 2 small jars and 2 large jars with some left over!!!! It truly does eliminate odors! The best part? The gels COMPLETELY dissolve once they're dry. You might find a few dried kernels at the VERY end, but it's minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Lin

customer_reviews.title: Banishes pet smells
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best for getting rid of cat smells. First day or two that it's out, you can smell the Fresh Wave, but then that dissapates along with the pet odors. I order this a lot because it works!
customer_reviews.author: E. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh but cannot overpower the worst smells
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this product could freshen an entire bathroom that was smelling very bad due to a faulty P trap in the floor. While it helped significantly, it did not eliminate the odor completely. In addition, the product evaporates very quickly and this seemingly large 64oz jar will be gone before you know it. It produces a fresh clean smell that didn't bother anyone which is a huge plus. Would recommend this item but don't expect it to magically eliminate all odors.
customer_reviews.author: Chad K

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t say its a horrible buy but not exactly the greatest. Can’t really see a difference in smell before using vers after. The scent isn’t exactly appealing. Stick to candles is my motto
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pearson

product_meta.title: Fresh Wave Odor Removing Gel Refill, 3 lbs. 15 oz. (63 oz.)
feature_bullets: Fresh Wave Gel is an odor absorber & neutralizer for your kitchen, bathroom, or any other room. It eliminates odors from cooking, trash, mildew, and more.
Our odor eliminator gel works great as a pet odor eliminator, getting rid of smells from dogs & cats, and as a bathroom odor absorber.
Place the odor absorber where the odor is strongest to remove it. Fresh Wave even works on cigarette smoke smells.

Fresh Wave Gels have earned a Safer Choice label from the EPA! They're non-toxic, non-GMO, and non-hazardous, and safe for people, pets, and the planet. No harsh chemicals, synthetic perfumes, alcohol, or phthalates. Manufactured in Rising Sun, Indiana.

Fresh Wave's plant-based ingredients include pine needle, lime, clove, anise, and cedarwood. The gel smells like these plants, but that scent will vanish as the gel evaporates into the air, leaving your space simply smelling clean and fresh.
Non-toxic to humans, animals and the environment
Gel will dissipate over time, replace when low
